ERROR.NETWORK: Network error, please check your connection
ERROR.UNKNWON: An error occurs, please retry later...

LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: Enter your email below to login to your account

LOGOUT.TITLE: Logout
LOGOUT.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want ot logout?

INFORMATION.TITLE: Profile information
INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Update your account's profile information and email address.

DELETE.TITLE: Delete Account
DELETE.WARNING: Deleting your account is irreversible. All your data will be lost. Are you sure you want to delete your account?

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm Account deletion
CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION: This action is irreversible and will delete all your data permanently.

DELETE.ERROR: An error occurred while deleting your account

AUTHENTICATION.TITLE: Authentication
AUTHENTICATION.EXPLANATION: Link one or more of the following providers to your account to access it using them.
